content: single_crochet in each double_crochet and 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet place a marker at the top corner then count the stitches between the markers we ll call that number a for reference i made 31 chains 10 row in height and have 61 single_crochet stitches between the marker 2 vivreflou side & base panel to make this part of the bag chain until you reach the width you want then work single_crochet row back and forth remember the stitch count you noted earlier you ll repeat the row until you have a minus 1 row when you reach the height you want chain 1 and start making single_crochet around the edge place a marker at the top corner yo make it easier 3 vivreflou back & cover panel for the back and cover panel you need to follow the same pattern as the front panel build up the row until you have double the row count of front panel then and few more row so the flap can cover the side panel properly from the top of your work count down the row until you match the same number of row as the front panel then place a marker there for reference my front panel has 10 row and my cover panel has 26 row so i need to place marker at the edge of row 16 assemble join the front panel and the panel with the right side touching each other and wrong side facing you work single_crochet through front loop and back loop only starting from the stitches you mark before repeat the same steps to attach the back cover panel 4 vivreflou done congratulations your beautiful shell bag is complete now you can add magnetic button to connect the front and cover then attach your strap don t forget to tag me on instagram @vivreflou and let me see your beautiful making 5 vivreflou
